text: The Price Daniel Unit is a state prison for men located in Snyder, Scurry County, Texas, owned by operated by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice. This facility was opened in August 1989, and a maximum capacity of 1384 male inmates held at various security levels. ==References== Category:Prisons in Texas Category:Buildings and structures in Scurry County, Texas Category:1989 establishments in Texas
title: Price Daniel Unit
